text:
="preserve">Anatoly Mykhailovych Samoilenko () (January 2, 1938 – December 4, 2020) was a Ukrainian mathematician. He was an Academician of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine from 1995 until his death and he was the Director of the Institute of Mathematics of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine from 1988 until his death. Samoilenko was born in Potiivka, Soviet Union.
Samoilenko died on December 4, 2020 in Kyiv, Ukraine at the age of 82.

annotations.surface_form: National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine
Institute of Mathematics of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine
